channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 1st September
item.description:
Yet again, local resident has dumped their ceap, rubbish on the street. Hope you find an adresss in there, abt time these people got told and fined

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hutchins Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on Ashwin Street / no public bins, 1st September
item.description:
There is rubbish constantly littering the entirety of Ashwin Street and it seems to have become worse over recent months. There are no public bins available on the street, restaurants are open until the early hours and so the street gets covered in litter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ashwin Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: St George Flag on roundabout, 1st September
item.description:
Someone has painted a St George's flag on the roundabout here which is extremely dangerous for traffic but also for guide dogs who take signals like this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rossetti Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle - 3 days, 1st September
item.description:
Vehicle parked on left corner of exit from Abbeywood Caravan and motorhome Club Campsite, making it near impossible for large Motorhome and Caravans to exit. It has been there for 3 days parked on double yellow lines.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Federation Road, Abbey Wood, London
